segments.text: I notice the angled view of the kitchen counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is a waterfall right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours over, wetting the floor and doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in the puddle, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, the cookie jar is open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances on the unsteady stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might fall and break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl anticipates her cookie eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's playful, but the wet floor adds danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view outside is serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's a recipe for accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope it turns out okay.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes could topple too.
segments.speaker: PAR
